category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Own_Material_MDS_attrib_maps_to
preference.preference_description: Defines the name of the attribute of the Material Revision, which is to be used to map the standard material number supplied in International Material Data System (IMDS) files. The default value is item_id.
